entry.title: Circle of Friends
entry.summary:
Vendor: islandrose.net
Type:
Price: 2760.00

Nine Single-Stem Rose Arrangements

Everyone has that special Circle of Friends that they truly rely on day in and day out. Thank them for being in your life, making you laugh on good days, and having your back on not-so-good days.

Get 9 separate single-stem arrangements delivered to your address so you can give them personally to your circle of friends!

Absolutely no hidden fees! For your convenience, all our prices already include Service Charges, Taxes, and Delivery Fees. Happy Shopping!

*Our priority is to deliver your flowers on time! If certain flowers unexpectedly become unavailable, Island Rose will replace them with flowers of equal or greater value.
**Island Rose offers next-day delivery nationwide! Same-day delivery is available in Metro Manila.
